item.title: 2 CSS Effect Libraries for Creating Fancy Animations
item.description: Photo by Sai Kiran Anagani Vijayawada Animation is fun. It makes everything look vivid. A good animation is that you won’t notice its existence but it pleases your eyes and makes you feel good! To see fancy animations is really enjoyable, but to make it is not. Specially for me, a CSS -webkit newbie, creating animations with CSS is a dirty job. It needs a lot of guess work and experiments to archive the expect results.
